title: The Proper Punishment
description: This is a free novella revisiting the characters from the Knights of the Board Room series, specifically Honor Bound, Book 3. It is posted on Joey W. Hill's website. Two volumes containing ALL the novella and short story character revisits written through 2016 are available for sale in ebook and print, but you can find the individual stories still available as FREE downloads in the most common ebook formats.A vignette featuring Peter, Dana and Ben from the Knights of the Board Room series. This is the night Peter and Ben shared Dana, which Dana mentioned in Afterlife, Book 4.
author: Joey W. Hill
